Use shinymanager labels

Source: R/language.R
use_language.Rd

See all labels registered with get_labels(), then set custom text with set_labels().

use_language(lan = "en")

Arguments

lan

Language to use for labels, supported values are : "en", "fr", "pt-BR", "es", "de", "pl", "ja", "el", "id", "zh-CN".

Value

A language object

Examples


use_language(lan = "fr")
#> <shinymanager_language>
#>   Public:
#>     clone: function (deep = FALSE) 
#>     get: function (label) 
#>     get_DT: function () 
#>     get_all: function () 
#>     get_dateInput: function () 
#>     get_language: function () 
#>     get_language_registered: function () 
#>     initialize: function () 
#>     set_language: function (lan) 
#>   Private:
#>     DT_lan: list
#>     dateInput_lan: list
#>     labels: list
#>     language: fr
#>     language_registered: en fr pt-BR es de pl ja el id zh-CN
#>     length: function ()
